dict.string: 1. View photo’s tags and camera data. 2. That’s it, actually.

Hello guys and girls! Thank you for testing this app. So I decided to change the name from PhotoBox to Delightful. It just sounds,,, delightful to hear :)
Anyway, how do you find the app so far? Like it? Hate it? Need improvement? Let me know, please. Reach me on Twitter @nicnocquee or simply reply to TestFlight email.
Cheers, Nico
